content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #136

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Make clear that the Intent Verification process is also applied for Unsubscribing

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Unsubscribe
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Make clear that the Intent Verification process is also applied for Unsubscribing

Comment: I suggest adding a sentence that the Intent Verification process is also applied for Unsubscribing

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._
